wikipedia_page.main: Alexander Stewart Bell (born 13 March 1931) is a Scottish former professional footballer, who played as a goalkeeper.

response: * Alex Bell (1882–1934), Scottish footballer (Manchester United, Blackburn Rovers, Scotland)
* Alex Bell (footballer, born 1931), Scottish footballer (Partick Thistle, Exeter City, Grimsby Town)
* Alex Bell, contestant on Survivor: The Amazon (2003)
* Alex Bell (Hollyoaks), a character in the British soap opera Hollyoaks
